Uses of Class
application.Game.BaseSprite

  • Packages that use BaseSprite 
    Package Description
    application.Game
    These classes house the main functions of the game including sprites, the game engine, as well as sound management.

    • Uses of BaseSprite in application.Game

      Subclasses of BaseSprite in application.Game 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  EvilExam
      Evil exam class, used in creating the evil exam sprites This class inherits all members of the base class base sprite and adds unique methods as well.
      class  Louie
      Sprite class for louie, inherits all members from base sprite and creates a new method for jumping.
      Methods in application.Game with parameters of type BaseSprite 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean BaseSprite.intersects(BaseSprite s)
      Checks if this sprites rectangle intersects with another sprite.
